verses.verse: ר֛וּחַ <WH7307> The Spirit אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD עָלָ֑י <WH5921> and יַ֡עַן <WH3282> Because מָשַׁח֩ <WH4886> hath anointed יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> [is] upon me because the LORD אֹתִ֜י <WH853> לְבַשֵּׂ֣ר <WH1319> me to preach good tidings עֲנָוִ֗ים <WH6035> unto the meek שְׁלָחַ֙נִי֙ <WH7971> he hath sent לַחֲבֹ֣שׁ <WH2280> me to bind up לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <WH7665> break down לֵ֔ב <WH3820> care for לִקְרֹ֤א <WH7121> to proclaim לִשְׁבוּיִם֙ <WH7617> to the captives דְּר֔וֹר <WH1865> liberty וְלַאֲסוּרִ֖ים <WH631> to [them that are] bound פְּקַח־ קֽוֹחַ׃ <WH6495> and the opening of the prison

לִקְרֹ֤א <WH7121> To proclaim שְׁנַת־ <WH8141> year רָצוֹן֙ <WH7522> the acceptable לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְי֥וֹם <WH3117> and the day נָקָ֖ם <WH5359> of vengeance לֵאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God לְנַחֵ֖ם <WH5162> to comfort כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲבֵלִֽים׃ <WH57> all that mourn

לָשׂ֣וּם ׀ <WH7760> To appoint לַאֲבֵלֵ֣י <WH57> unto them that mourn צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> in Zion לָתֵת֩ <WH5414> to give לָהֶ֨ם פְּאֵ֜ר <WH6287> unto them beauty תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> instead אֵ֗פֶר <WH665> for ashes שֶׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> the oil שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> of joy תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> instead אֵ֔בֶל <WH60> for mourning מַעֲטֵ֣ה <WH4594> the garment תְהִלָּ֔ה <WH8416> of praise תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> instead ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> for the spirit כֵּהָ֑ה <WH3544> of heaviness וְקֹרָ֤א <WH7121> that they might be called לָהֶם֙ אֵילֵ֣י <WH352> trees הַצֶּ֔דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness מַטַּ֥ע <WH4302> the planting יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהִתְפָּאֵֽר׃ <WH6286> that he might be glorified

וּבָנוּ֙ <WH1129> And they shall build חָרְב֣וֹת <WH2723> wastes עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> the old שֹׁמְמ֥וֹת <WH8074> desolations רִֽאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> the former יְקוֹמֵ֑מוּ <WH6965> they shall raise up וְחִדְּשׁוּ֙ <WH2318> and they shall repair עָ֣רֵי <WH5892> cities חֹ֔רֶב <WH2721> the waste שֹׁמְמ֖וֹת <WH8074> the desolations דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations

וְעָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> shall stand זָרִ֔ים <WH2114> And strangers וְרָע֖וּ <WH7462> and feed צֹאנְכֶ֑ם <WH6629> your flocks וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the sons נֵכָ֔ר <WH5236> of the alien אִכָּרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH406> [shall be] your plowmen וְכֹרְמֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH3755> and your vinedressers

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <WH3548> the Priests יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD תִּקָּרֵ֔אוּ <WH7121> But ye shall be named מְשָׁרְתֵ֣י <WH8334> you the Ministers אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God יֵאָמֵ֖ר <WH559> [men] shall call לָכֶ֑ם חֵ֤יל <WH2428> the riches גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the Gentiles תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> ye shall eat וּבִכְבוֹדָ֖ם <WH3519> and in their glory תִּתְיַמָּֽרוּ׃ <WH3235> shall ye boast

תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> Instead בָּשְׁתְּכֶם֙ <WH1322> For your shame מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <WH4932> [ye shall have] double וּכְלִמָּ֖ה <WH3639> and [for] confusion יָרֹ֣נּוּ <WH7442> they shall rejoice חֶלְקָ֑ם <WH2506> in their portion לָכֵ֤ן <WH3651> Therefore בְּאַרְצָם֙ <WH776> therefore in their land מִשְׁנֶ֣ה <WH4932> the double יִירָ֔שׁוּ <WH3423> they shall possess שִׂמְחַ֥ת <WH8057> joy עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> everlasting תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָהֶֽם׃

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For I the LORD אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> love מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment שֹׂנֵ֥א <WH8130> I hate גָזֵ֖ל <WH1498> robbery בְּעוֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> for burnt offering וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> and I will direct פְעֻלָּתָם֙ <WH6468> their work בֶּאֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> in truth וּבְרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> an everlasting אֶכְר֥וֹת <WH3772> and I will make לָהֶֽם׃

וְנוֹדַ֤ע <WH3045> shall be known בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> among the Gentiles זַרְעָ֔ם <WH2233> And their seed וְצֶאֱצָאֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6631> and their offspring בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among הָעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> the people כָּל־ <WH3605> All רֹֽאֵיהֶם֙ <WH7200> all that see יַכִּיר֔וּם <WH5234> them shall acknowledge כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they זֶ֖רַע <WH2233> them that they [are] the seed בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [which] the LORD ס

שׂ֧וֹשׂ <WH7797> I will greatly אָשִׂ֣ישׂ <WH7797> rejoice בַּֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> in the LORD תָּגֵ֤ל <WH1523> shall be joyful נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> my soul בֵּֽאלֹהַ֔י <WH430> in my God כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הִלְבִּישַׁ֙נִי֙ <WH3847> for he hath clothed בִּגְדֵי־ <WH899> me with the garments יֶ֔שַׁע <WH3468> of salvation מְעִ֥יל <WH4598> me with the robe צְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> of righteousness יְעָטָ֑נִי <WH3271> he hath covered כֶּֽחָתָן֙ <WH2860> as a bridegroom יְכַהֵ֣ן <WH3547> decketh פְּאֵ֔ר <WH6287> [himself] with ornaments וְכַכַּלָּ֖ה <WH3618> and as a bride תַּעְדֶּ֥ה <WH5710> adorneth כֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3627> [herself] with her jewels

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For כָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> For as the earth תּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> bringeth forth צִמְחָ֔הּ <WH6780> her bud וּכְגַנָּ֖ה <WH1593> and as the garden זֵרוּעֶ֣יהָ <WH2221> causeth the things that are sown תַצְמִ֑יחַ <WH6779> in it to spring forth כֵּ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> So אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> so the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD יַצְמִ֤יחַ <WH6779> to spring forth צְדָקָה֙ <WH6666> will cause righteousness וּתְהִלָּ֔ה <WH8416> and praise נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> before all the nations
